InstallModule(String)

Installs a new module into XTMF

Declaration
bool InstallModule(string moduleFileName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String moduleFileName

The module to install
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

True if we could successfully install the module, false otherwise
Remarks

Avoid using this if you can, if you do this a client without administrative permissions could fail to run
